title: Oceanfront Mexico Escape with Nightly Cocktails and US$200 Food & Beverage Credit
description: Dreaming of a relaxing getaway with your better half? Ready to soak up some sun in an exotic location? It’s time to make that dream a reality with a stunning escape at Hilton Los Cabos Beach & Golf Resort. This elegant resort in Mexico’s most iconic holiday destination boasts access to one of the area’s only swim-safe beaches, plus world-class restaurants, championship golf courses and two incredible pools complete with swim-up bars. Embark on an unforgettable holiday with daily buffet breakfasts, nightly sunset cocktails, a USD$200 Food & Beverage voucher to use at one of the resort’s eight restaurants, a USD$100 spa voucher to use at Eforea Spa, a fabulous welcome hamper complete with delicious seasonal treats and more. Plus, upgrade to a VIP or Celebrity Package and enjoy exclusive Club Vista privileges, including access to the sophisticated Club Vista Room, a nightly free-flow Happy Hour and more.
